entry.title: Kuhy
entry.content:
This is a moch of the map of Kuhy where the first game will take place.


Kuky was the biggest country on Fheohs. Kuhy originally expanded to nearly the entirety of the continent it is on. With disagreements from the major provinces of Kuhy it split forming the countrys you now see on the map of Fheohs. In the time the game is set the Regni have taken over Rater and are starting to invade Kuhy.
entry.summary: This is a moch of the map of Kuhy where the first game will take place.

entry.title: Ogfi
entry.content:
I have been currently working on the script for the first issue and I am aiming to get it finished by the end of the month so I can draw the issue over Christmas. Hopefully releasing the issue some time next year. This is a WIP of Coda’s brother Jack in the style I have finaly chosen for the comics.


Working on the story for the first volume I have decided to create a mod for Fallout NV set on the planet Coda will go to during the volume. The planet is called Ogfi and is far into the pirate district in the galaxy with not to friendly characters for Coda to meet. My hoping with this is to get a better feel on the world the volume takes place in to make the volume more believable and interesting to read.
entry.summary: I have been currently working on the script for the first issue and I am aiming to get it finished by the end of the month so I can draw the issue over Christmas. Hopefully releasing the issue some time next year. This is a WIP of Coda’s brother Jack in the style I have finaly chosen for the comics.

entry.title: Coda’s Brother
entry.content: I have currently been focusing on the script for the first issue but managed to get the a WIP idea if how I want Coda’s brother (Jack) to look.
entry.summary: I have currently been focusing on the script for the first issue but managed to get the a WIP idea if how I want Coda’s brother (Jack) to look.

entry.title: Comic
entry.content:
Recently I decided to start a comic. Currently just getting the characters sorted out. This is a wip of the first page of the first issue.


The characters started out in a fallout 4 mod set in Arizona. After realising I wanted to focus more on the characters I decided to make something for them in their own universe. After reading The Walking Dead I decided a comic would best suit the story. I will probably eventually make a game equivalent but for the moment I want to focus on the characters. These are th two main characters as I currently invisen them. Coda Radel and Jake Reih.
entry.summary: Recently I decided to start a comic. Currently just getting the characters sorted out. This is a wip of the first page of the first issue.
